definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: pf. [[הוֹעִיל]] Hb Hab 2:18; Impf. [[יוֹעִיל]] Je 2:11 + 2 t.; [[אׂעִיל]] Job 35:3; [[יוֹעִילוּ]] 1Sa 12:21 + 6 t.; [[יוֹעִ֫לוּ]] Je 2:8, Je 12:13; [[יוֹעִילוּח]] Is 57:12; [[נוֹעִיל]] Job 21:15; Inf. abs. [[הוֹעֵיל]] Je 23:22; cstr. [[הוֹעִיל]] Je 7:8 + 4 t.; Pt. [[מוֹעִיל]] Je 16:19; —profit, avail, benefit, always (exc. Job 30:13 where in bad sense, Is 47:12) c. neg., or in question implying neg.; esp. of idols or false gods (as unprofitable), so Hb Hab 2:18, Is 44:9, Is 44:10, Is 57:12, Je 2:8 [[אחרי לא יועילו הבו]], v:Je 2:11 [[המיר כבידו בלוא יועיל]], Je 16:19 [[ואין בם מועיל]], 1Sa 12:21, of vain confidences Je 7:8, or promises Je 23:32, Je 23:32 (sq. [[לְ]]); of Egypt as ally Is 30:5 (sq. [[לְ]]), v:Is 30:5, v:Is 30:6; of wickedness Pr 10:2; wealth Pr 11:4; worthless men Job 30:13 ([[לְהַוׇּתִי יועִילוּ]] i.e. promote it); of words Job 15:3 (‖[[דָּבָר לאׁ יִסְכּוֹן]]); in gen. gain profit Is 47:12, Is 48:17, Je 12:13, Job 21:15, Job 35:3.
